AI Phase

Architectural Vision

The initial etchings of formulating a
strategic vision to meet the end goal.

Phase I

Rules Based

TThis is the AI that will launch with SGO and is embedded in the smart contract. It doesn't require as much data since it is hand coded with "rules" that will determine its decision process and behavior.

Phase II

Adaptable Expert System

Phase III will employ Random Forest Decision Tree technology for this upgraded AI phase. Decision trees are a human understandable AI system - it is easy to see how this AI system reaches conclusions. Decisions are broken down based on decision points (or parameters).

Phase III

Generative, Pre-trained (GPT4 level)

This is the "Cadillac" of AI's -the latest technology that has taken the world by storm. Once we have enough data, we can pre-train this level of AI to handle SGO. The key to having a successful Generative AI is having lots of data.
